creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: horned beast with body of a deer, head of a lion, and scaled wings; standing on waves with a book borne on clouds on its back; grey-green stone with rust-brown and cloudy white mottling
title: Recumbent Figure of an Auspicious Mythical Beast (<I>Qilin<I>)
